Author: bruhmomentbruhhhbrug
Text: Thanks - I just need to fit into the clothes I got - it’s not just holiday it’s work too. Just a few kilos makes literally worlds difference in my fitting, like whether I can wear certain jeans comfortably or not at all.

Author: yes_creamcheese
Text: I think you can definitely lose weight in Vietnam. Local food is relatively healthy (I'm thinking noodle soups, rice with savory side dishes and vegetables. Steamed seafood is also a big thing there and very low in calories) and the portion size is much smaller than in, say, America. All in all, be easy on yourself and enjoy this vacation!
